original_title: Ritter, Schmiede, Edelfrauen - Kärntens Burgen einst und jetzt
overview: How was a castle built in the Middle Ages? With which tools, which technology? Answers to these exciting questions can be found in Friesach in Austria's southernmost province of Carinthia.
title: Ritter, Schmiede, Edelfrauen - Kärntens Burgen einst und jetzt
